alert.note: Alert for Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 11 at 3:11PM EST until December 13 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow possible, especially on the central and southern Tug Hill. Total snow accumulations of 7 inches or more possible in the most persistent lake snows. * WHERE...Oswego and Lewis counties. The heaviest lake effect snow Tuesday evening through Wednesday afternoon will be across the central and southern Tug Hill Plateau. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute on Wednesday.
info.instruction: Narrow bands of heavy snow could impact portions of the region. Localized travel problems will be possible.
